DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Periodontal Response Non Surgical Therapy Pre Post Menopausal Women With Periodontitis
DOC.detailed_description: AIM : The aim present study evaluate periodontal status pre post-menopausal woman periodontitis follow non-surgical therapy . MATERIALS AND METHODS : Periodontal status measure Periodontal index ( PRI ) , oral hygiene status measure plaque index ( PI ) . Both parameter measure baseline i.e Scaling Root Planing ( SRP ) 3 month interval post treatment . SRP do pre & post menopause group .
DOC.criteria: Patients least 15 natural teeth remain Non smoker Systemically healthy past 6 month Present past smoker Below 40 year age With gross oral pathology tumor Patients long term steroid medication Undergoing Hormone replacement therapy ( HRT ) Pregnant woman plan pregnancy Those receive periodontal therapy precede 6 month Those medication precede 6 month Any systemic disorder medication affect periodontal status exclude study .
